results.title: Castlemaine Community Lunch
results.creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
results.brief_description: The Castlemaine Community Lunch is a weekly event organised by the Castlemaine Community House. It brings people together in a warm and welcoming environment, encouraging and nurturing friendships and connections. Attended by locals, old and new, it is also a chance to welcome newcomers into the community.
results.description: The Castlemaine Community Lunch is a weekly event organised by the Castlemaine Community House. results.title: Castlemaine artists
results.creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
results.brief_description: Castlemaine boasts a thriving art scene from emerging to established artists. This film introduces us to some of these artists; including mosaic artists, musicians, painters, and printmakers; and takes us through the creative spaces in which they work. They discuss how their immediate environment has influenced their art and how the many artistic hubs become vibrant gathering spaces for the community.
results.description: Castlemaine boasts a thriving art scene from emerging to established artists. This film introduces us to some of these artists; including mosaic artists, musicians, painters, and printmakers; and takes us through the creative spaces in which they work. results.title: Turmoil [game trailer]
results.brief_description:
This challenging platform game takes place in the year 3000, amid environmental chaos. Your task is to deliver the final piece of a time machine that will allow scientists to travel to the past to introduce sustainable thinking practices.

This trailer illustrates how the game is played.

results.title: Kalihgat
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Terry Melvin and ACMI
results.brief_description: Terry Melvin recalls a cathartic event from his youth, when he travelled as a university student to India. In Calcutta, he worked in a hospice for the dying and destitute and tells of the experiences that have shaped and haunted the person his is today.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Terry Melvin and ACMI
results.description: Terry Melvin recalls a cathartic event from his youth, when he travelled as a university student to India. In Calcutta, he worked in a hospice for the dying and destitute and tells of the experiences that have shaped and haunted the person his is today.

results.title: May's early days
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Robyn Colls and ACMI
results.brief_description: Through Robyn’s tribute to the life and experiences of her mother, May, she gives us some insight of a spirited woman and her connection with the region in which she grew up.

results.title: Italian settlement in the Yarra Valley
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Maria McCarthy and ACMI
results.brief_description: Maria McCarthy recalls the stories from her youth, the ones told about her families’ voyage from Italy to Australia and settling in the Yarra Valley. She tells of her parents’ adoption of a new culture and way of life and the legacy of those decisions on the present.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Maria McCarthy and ACMI
